Title: A Perfect Day
Writer: Fernando León de Aranoa, Diego Farias (collaborating writer), Paula Farias (novel)
Actors: Benicio Del Toro, Tim Robbins, Olga Kurylenko, Mélanie Thierry
Plot: A group of aid workers work to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone.
Production: Mediapro Pictures, Televisión Española (TVE), Reposado Producciones
